RACE.RACE_TEXT: Jonathan Sheppard H. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 1 2 3/8M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 150000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES A HURDLE HANDICAP FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. This is a Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. Closed Saturday, August 12, 2023 with 13 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWAKENED jumped well while saving ground under reserve, came under coaxing after fence eight, was urged along in the two path on the final turn, rallied to make a bid in upper stretch, gained to short lead while drifting out in the final furlong and prevailed under strong urging. JIMMY P was rated while jumping well on the inside, took the lead after the final fence, drifted out in upper stretch, fought on well when headed in the final furlong but missed while just able to get the place. MCTIGUE (IRE) jumped well while reserved off the pace, drafted inside on the final turn, was asked while finding room near the quarter-pole, made a bid while carried out in upper stretch, fought on well in the final furlong and just missed the place while well clear for the show. MERRY MAKER (IRE) tossed his head after landing over fence one, raced at the rear while widest, bobbled landing over fence four, remained towards the rear through the final jump and failed to threaten. L'IMPERATOR (FR) raced outside while mostly in the three path, bobbled landing over fence eight, was asked in perfect striking position on the final turn and came up empty. REDICEAN (GB) jumped well while off the pace and failed to respond. CARAMELISED (GB) tossed his head after landing over fence, settled towards the rear while towards the outside, tucked in for the run around the fourth turn, was asked for his best on the final turn and also failed to respond. NOAH AND THE ARK (IRE) jumped well while tracking on the outside, came up empty on the final turn and retreated. WEST NEWTON (GB) went to the front, jumped inward significantly at the fences, bumped with a rival after fence nine and faded. THEOCRAT (IRE) was rank coming to fence three then checked off heels after that fence, jumped awkwardly at fences four and seven then faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: L'Imperator (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside,mostly 3path,bobbled fence 8,asked final turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Jimmy P
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Willis Molly and Willis Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside,jumped well,lead after 9,drift out 3/16,fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Awakened
ENTRY.OWNER: Riverdee Stable and Ten Strike Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved,jumped well,saved ground,bid 1/8,drifted out,prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Theocrat (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank to fence 3,checked after fence 3,awkward fences4,7,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Noah And The Ark (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside,jumped well,came up empty,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Merry Maker (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tossed head after fence 1,at rear,bobbled fence 4,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Redicean (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: jumped well, off pace, failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: West Newton (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front,jumped inward,bumped after fence 9,faded

ENTRY.NAME: McTigue (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: jumped well,draft ins final turn,ask1/4,bid,carried out,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Caramelised (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Sheppard, Sharon E. and Johnston, Gillian
ENTRY.COMMENT: toss head fence 1, towards back, no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 55000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $ 20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERFECT MUNNINGS chased three then two wide in closest aim of the spurting away leader, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, advanced and swung four wide into upper stretch overhauling the now leg weary leader straightened away, went clear under a drive to prevail. BRONX BOMBER tipped out to bump with UNFLAPPABLE MAX five and a half furlongs from home, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to secure the place honors. BUSTIN SHOUT broke in at the start and was corrected, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. UNFLAPPABLE MAX coaxed from the gate, got bumped by BRONX BOMBER with five and a half furlongs to run, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened. LOHENGRIN TWO spurted away in command from the two path through swift splits, came under light coaxing near the quarter pole, his once large margin now for all intents and purposes gone, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and was overthrown straightened away and tired. VICTORY BUILT coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside until tipped to the two path half a mile from home, got coaxed along midway on the turn, went seven wide into upper stretch, trailed throughout and was eased home through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Victory Built
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, to 2p 1/2, 7w uppr, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Shout
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 4-5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Munnings
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, up str away, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Bronx Bomber
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC and Five Horsemen Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped foe 5 1/2, chased 3-2w, 3w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Lohengrin Two
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC Victory Circle Racing WLIR R
ENTRY.COMMENT: spurted away 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, yielded, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Unflappable Max
ENTRY.OWNER: Ferraro M Anthony Paley Michael and Wells Elliot S
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, bumped 5 1/2, chased 4-3w, 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Turf CR: 105. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 162500. (PURSE $125,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $28,275 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 20 23 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARZAK broke near the back of the field then was taken in hand, moved up under coaxing then settled near the middle of the field, went two then three wide on the turn, rallied five wide into the stretch, closed strongly to make a bid inside the furlong marker, gained a short lead in the final sixteenth, fought with the runner-up to the finish and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. COPPOLA went to the front, showed the way with an uncontested advantage, raced inside on the turn, spunoff the rail into upper stretch, responded well when put to a right-handed crop inside the three-sixteenths, led under a drive into the final sixteenth then was headed, fought on with the winner to the finish and just missed while clear for the place. BRING ME A CHECK settled off the pace, moved closer while three wide on the turn, was roused near the five-sixteenths, came four wide into the stretch, chased the top two into the final sixteenth and lacked the needed kick while just able to get the show. THIN WHITE DUKE settled near the back, was roused two then three wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and improved to just miss the show while narrowly up for the last spot in the superfecta. CAZADERO broke out and was off a step slow, settled towards the rear, was roused while inside to the two path on the turn, came four wide into the stretch then tipped further out under the crop, chased into the final furlong and also lacked the needed kick then just missed the superfecta. MID DAY IMAGE broke out but was quickly corrected by the rider, was well placed just off the pace on the inside, drafted along the rail on the turn, was asked while cutting the corner into the stretch, chased into the final furlong and weakened. SLIPSTREAM was reserved near the back then hard held around the half-mile pole, went three then four wide while let out on the turn, was driven six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. HIGH FRONT tracked the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and tired. JAXON TRAVELER settled on the outside without cover, was asked three then four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Mid Day Image
ENTRY.OWNER: Winning Move Stable, Sanford H. Robbins LLC and Jacobson, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,well placed,inside turn,asked1/4,chased,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Cazadero
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,step slow,settled,ask ins-2p turn,4w1/4,mvd out,gained

ENTRY.NAME: Coppola
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,inside turn,responded well,led past 1/16,caught

ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing Dubb Michael and Bouchey Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside,asked 2path turn,3path1/4,chased,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Arzak
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke near back,mvd up,settled,2-3p trn,5w1/4,rallied,up last1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Slipstream
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved,hard held 1/2,3-4wide turn,6w1/4,failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Bring Me a Check
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,closer 3wide turn,ask5/16,4w1/4,chased,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Jaxon Traveler
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds and Delfiner Marvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,no cover,asked 3-4wide turn,5w1/4,faltered

ENTRY.OWNER: Gleaves Philip A Crist Steven deRegt Ken and Hilliard Bryan
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled near back,2-3path turn,improved position,missed show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. INNER TURF FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAUREL VALLEY established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive holding well and safe to the finish. SLAPINTHEFACE three then two wide through the first turn, chased four then three wide, got set down swinging four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive offering up a mild kick to secure the place honors latching on the aforementioned foe as he hit the finish. LT. MITCHELL chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. MISSION HILL chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn far turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch and kept on to secure the last major share. TONY O just off the inside through the first turn, chased three paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and offered no response. DOLLY'S BANK got bumped at the start by TIP OF THE BOOT due to pressure from FLUORESCENT BAY, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. CASH BAIL spun four to five wide into the first turn before tucking to the two path midway on that bend, chased just off the inside until tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and had no kick. FLUORESCENT BAY broke out at the start bumping TIP OF THE BOOT into DOLLY'S BANK, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. TIP OF THE BOOT got bumped at the start by the aforementioned foe and in turn bumped DOLLY'S BANK, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, cut the corner into upper stretch and tired. DRUID just off the inside through the first turn, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and was never involved. Please note that the setting of fourteen feet is not a setting available to teletimer and therefore the setting of nine feet was used to time races on the inner course for this race.

ENTRY.OWNER: Cummings John P and Reinacher Jr Robert J
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, angled 3-4w upper, kept on

ENTRY.OWNER: Davis Edmund D King Donald F and Davis Marguerite
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2p, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, cut corner, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Slapintheface
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w 1st turn, chased 4-3w, set down 4w upper, dug in, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Tony O
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, chased 3w, to ins 7/16, inside 1/4, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Druid
ENTRY.OWNER: Goodwin Farms Dempsey Thomas A Three Percent Gang Joyce Kevin DeVaney Randall an
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 6w upper, never involved

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, to ins 7/16, inside 1/4, held well & safe

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Bail
ENTRY.COMMENT: spun 4-5w into 1st trn, chased 2p, ins 1/2, 4w uppr, no kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 95000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APRIL ANTICS went two then three wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was given her cue in the four path on the far turn, gained to make an outside bid outside the furlong marker, took the lead outside the sixteenth-pole then moved clear under strong handling. KARA PARA traveled three wide on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, vied in the three path on the far turn, was asked near the five-sixteenths, took a short lead into upper stretch, led under a drive into the final furlong but was overtaken while clear for the place. DISRUPTION went to the front, showed the way in the two path while in hand, was asked outside the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage into upper stretch, fought under a drive into the final furlong and weakened while able to get the show. I'M NERVOUS NOW saved ground while restrained off heels on the first turn, was rated off the rail on the backstretch, drafted inside on the far turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, chased into the final furlong and also weakened. SARATOGA CHROME was fractious in the gate, went three to four wide on the turns and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: April Antics
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC SOK Racing and Politano James
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3p1st,stlkd outside,ask4p2nd,bid outside1/8,lead out1/16,clear

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Nervous Now
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated ins 1st,off rail backstretch,ins2nd,ask5/16,chased,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Disruption
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way 2p,in hand,asked5/16,headed3/16,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Kara Para
ENTRY.OWNER: Stoneybrook Farm Trust and Potash Edward C
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,prompted outside,ask5/16,led3/16-1/8,overtaken,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Chrome
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell David E and Powers Sandra
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,4w1st,at rear,urged 3-4w2nd turn,no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 83. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKYLER'S STARSHIP coaxed from the gate, chased three wide, tucked to the two path midway on the turn advancing to take over the front with five-sixteenths to go, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, got headed by MISCHIEF JOKE at the three-sixteenths, came again to take back command inside the eighth pole, then edged away to the finish to prevail. MISCHIEF JOKE chased four then three wide, swung four wide into upper stretch and took over narrow command at the three-sixteenths, shied out two paths under a left handed crop and was headed for the front just inside the eighth pole, dug in running on to the finish well clear of the rest for the place honors. B D SAINTS broke a beat slow, chased six then five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and kept on to secure the show honors. BLUE EIGHTY FIVE chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. EZ ROLL chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun three wide into upper stretch, weakened. ALBEDO broke out at the start, chased two then three wide, seemed intent on splitting foes midway on the turn and was forced to steady off the heels of DIXIE PHARAOH and BENZODINI at the five-sixteenths, went five to six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. OFFICER DERICK coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, yielded the front with five-sixteenths to go, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. DIXIE PHARAOH chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled seven wide into upper stretch, tired. BENZODINI coaxed from the gate, showed brief speed along the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went just off the inside into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Albedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2-3w, steady 5/16, 5-6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Benzodini
ENTRY.OWNER: Bell Richard A and Bell John M
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, brief speed ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, 2w 1/4p, faltered

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed 3/8, yielded 5/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC and Hoffman Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 7/16, angled 7w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Skyler's Starship
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, up 5/16, 2w 1/4, headed, came again

ENTRY.OWNER: LRE Racing LLC and JEH Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, chased 6-5w, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Ez Roll
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: John's Call S. SARATOGA RACE 7 1 5/8M Turf CR: 108. Stakes Purse 135000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A GRADE ONE (GR I) OR GRADE TWO (GR II) SWEEPSTAKE ON THE TURF IN 2023.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAWNY PORT broke out and bumped with a foe, showed speed on the inside of a rival then was eased back off the pace on the first turn, tracked along the rail, was asked to move to the lead outside the half-mile pole, vied inside under urging on the final turn, drew clear in upper stretch and proved much the best under steady urging. SY DOG moved in early, saved ground while reserved under tight restraint towards the back, was asked leaving the backstretch, moved to the two path later on the final turn, shifted four wide into the stretch then came out some more and safely secured the place while no match for the winner. GOOD SKATE jostled with a rival on the opening straightaway, saved ground on the first turn, was rated off the pace, rounded the second turn in the two path, stalked outside down the backstretch, made a bid near the seven-sixteenths pole, vied in the two path while asked on the final turn, spun three wide into the stretch and weakened but was clear for the show. BRITISH ROYALTY bumped with a rival at the start, jostled with a foe early then dropped back, went around the first turn in the two path, was reserved at the back, started the second turn in the three path, shifted four wide while taken up some to avoid a troubled foe midway through that bend, continued at the rear on the backstretch, moved out near the half-mile pole, went three wide on the final turn and failed to threaten. TIDE OF THE SEA showed speed on the outside, set the pace in the two path, was headed outside the half-mile pole, came up empty in the two then three path on the final turn and faltered. BURNING BRIGHT bumped with an opponent at the start, jostled with two foes early, was rated outside in the two to three path, lost action badly on the second turn, veered in and hit the rail then fell and was reported to have suffered a fatal cardiac event. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE INCIDENT ON THE SECOND TURN, NO CHANGE WAS MADE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH. TWELVE FURLONG FRACTION WAS UNAVAILABLE DUE TO A TIMING ISSUE

ENTRY.NAME: Good Skate
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled early,ins1st,rated,2p2nd,bid7/16,2p3rd,3p1/4,wknd,clr3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Burning Bright
ENTRY.OWNER: AJ Suited Racing Stable LLC and Levitch Sr David
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,jostled,ratd2-3p,fatal cardiac event 2nd,hit rail,fell

ENTRY.NAME: British Royalty
ENTRY.OWNER: Lunsford Bruce and Minshall Barbara J
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,jstld early,drop back,3-4w 2nd and 3rd turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Tawny Port
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,bmpd,tracked ins,lead out1/2,responded,clear,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Tide of the Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside,2p1st,pace,2p2nd,headed1/2,2-3p3rd,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Sy Dog
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,reserved ins,tight hold,2p5/16,4w1/4,no match,earned2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 84. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. INNER TURF (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INTO IT got bumped askew at the start by TIZ THE COAST, who broke inwards, tracked the pace along the inside, took the inside route at the quarter pole before tipping to the two path roused straightened away into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, inched away under a drive kept to task. ROCKSTAR RED saved ground in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing just off the inside at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid, then ran on to secure the place honors. BEE WELL settled just off the inside in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. WILD GUESS forwardly placed three then two wide through the first turn, took over command just inside six furlongs to run, showed the way just off the inside before tucking inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, got collared at the eighth pole and kept on to salvage the last major share. BOLT D'PLATA two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. SIXWILLBERICH forwardly placed, took over command and showed the way along the inside into the first turn, got displaced from the front by WILD GUESS and tracked that rival along the inside in closest aim, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and was set down spinning three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. MUFRIH coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and made no late headway. THE ELUSIVE DRWONG chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and was steadied off the heels of a rival before altering to the inside, then weakened in the final furlong. MY FAVORITE TOPIC broke in step at the start brushing A LISTER, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late going. TIZ THE COAST broke in awkward at the start bumping INTO IT, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch and offered no rally. STRAPPED chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no response. A LISTER brushed at the start by MY FAVORITE TOPIC, chased just off the inside rank under restraint early on, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home and tired. Please note that the setting of fourteen feet is not a setting available to teletimer and therefore the setting of nine feet was used to time races on the inner course for this race.

ENTRY.NAME: The Elusive Drwong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, steady off heels uppr str, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Into It
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, tracked ins, ins 1/4, 2p str away, up 1/8, inched clr

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Guess

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMUNDSON was hustled to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside while challenged on the turn, responded well when asked for his best in upper stretch, shook clear under a right-handed crop into the final furlong and drew away under steady urging. STRAIGHT ARROW moved out entering the main-track, settled under some urging, dropped in leaving the backstretch, saved ground while asked for more on the turn, came out three wide into the stretch and just got up for the place. RADIO RED was hustled from the gate, tracked the pace on the outside, made a bid in the two path on the turn, fought outside of the winner under a drive in upper stretch, lost touch with that foe inside the furlong marker and weakened then lost the place while able to get the show. THRILL OF IT settled towards the rear, was urged two then three wide on the turn, came between horses outside the quarter-pole, spun five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed kick. PRINCE OF PHAROAHS settled under some urging, went three then four wide on the turn, floated seven wide into the stretch and failed to rally. AGGREGATION settled off the pace, was roused while inside to the two path on the turn, had his path taken while four wide into the stretch and came up empty. MONTEBELLO was urged along on the far outside, went four wide on the turn and failed to respond. WHAT'S UP BRO lost hist footing at the start and was off a step slow, was taken up while in tight between horses around the eleven-sixteenths, continued under a tight hold past the five-eighths pole, moved out near the nine-sixteenths then leveled out, went five wide on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Straight Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out 6-1/2,settled,mvd in 7/16,ins turn,shifted 3w1/4,up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Thrill of It
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,urged 2-3path turn,5w into lane,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Aggregation
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, asked ins-2path turn, path taken 4w 1/4, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Amundson
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pace,inside turn,shook foe 1/8,drew clear,steady urging

ENTRY.NAME: Radio Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,tracked outside,bid 2path 3/8,vied to 1/8,wknd,lost 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Pharoahs
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Morrison Matthew J and Crown Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled some urging,3-4wide turn,7w into lane,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: What's Up Bro
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing brk,step slw,tkn up 5-1/2,mvd out,5w turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Montebello
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,4wide turn,no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 5 1/2F Turf CR: 81. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHEROKEE COTTAGE coaxed from the gate, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch, rallied coming in slightly just inside the sixteenth marker forcing ACCEPT THE OUTCOME to pause at that juncture, then was up in the final jumps to prevail. IGUAZU (IRE) four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, came out slightly inside the sixteenth marker closing down the seam of ACCEPT THE OUTCOME in tandem with the aforementioned foe and was along belatedly for the place honors. LOVE MAMI LOVE tracked just off the inside from just off the pace, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take brief command a sixteenth out, then ran on to the finish getting collared in the final jumps by a pair of rivals. SHESASMALLTOWNGIRL broke in at the start forcing ACCEPT THE OUTCOME to steady, chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five wide for home, dug in under a drive missing at the end. ACCEPT THE OUTCOME (IRE) steadied at the start when SHESASMALLTOWNGIRL broke inwards, chased four then three wide briefly taking to the two path five-sixteenths from home, angled out seven wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying and was paused in tight when rivals in front closed down a seam just when she arrived to be briefly between them and remained on pause to the finish getting outfinished in the late stages. QUIESCENT dueled from the two path with SOLEVO SPRITZ to her inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. SOUPER TROPICAL broke out when coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide for home and offered no rally. NURSEKRINGLEDANCES coaxed from the gate, chased three to four wide until tucked to the two path through the turn, went five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. NEGRA GATA chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid, then weakened in the late stages. LEXI'S SPIRIT chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. CALL ME PENNY got brushed at the start by SOUPER TROPICAL, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. SOLEVO SPRITZ coaxed from the gate, dueled along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. There was a Stewards' Inquiry into deep stretch focusing on CHEROKEE COTTAGE, IGUAZU and ACCEPT THE OUTCOME before the result stood and the race was declared official.
